title: Why US Tech Giants Are Betting $67.5 Billion On India's AI, Data Centre Boom
description: US technology giants are investing huge amounts of money into India as the country positions itself at the centre of the global hub for data centres and artificial intelligence infrastructure.
content:

title: Gautam Adani To Inaugurate Centre Of Excellence In AI In Baramati On Sunday
description: Adani Enterprises Chairman Gautam Adani will inaugurate the Sharad Pawar Centre of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence in Baramati, Pune district. The centre, established under Vidya Pratishthan, is funded by the Adani Group. Key attendees include NCP (SP) head Sharad Pawar, Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Ajit Pawar, Baramati MP Supriya Sule, and Rajya Sabha MP Sunetra Pawar. This inauguration marks a continuation of the long-standing partnership between Adani and Pawar, dating back nearly two decades.
content:
Adani Enterprises Chairman Gautam Adani will inaugurate the Sharad Pawar Centre of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence in Baramati, Pune district on Sunday, marking a significant milestone in educational infrastructure development in the region.

title: Adani to Inaugurate Sharad Pawar AI Excellence Centre
description: Gautam Adani will inaugurate the Sharad Pawar Centre of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence in Baramati. The inauguration event will be attended by Sharad Pawar, Ajit Pawar, Supriya Sule, and Sunetra Pawar. Adani's ties with the Pawar family span nearly two decades, and the centre is supported by Vidya Pratishthan.
content:
Gautam Adani, Chairman of the Adani Group, is set to cut the ribbon on the Sharad Pawar Centre of Excellence in Artificial Intelligence in Baramati this Sunday, according to officials from the centre.

title: AI X climate change: Can advanced intelligence combat global warming?
description: CLIMATE change is considered the most critical challenge of our time, while artificial intelligence (AI) is the most advanced innovation of this generation. The question arises: What would pitting cutting-edge technologies against nature’s destructive forces look like?

title: What Is the Unexpected Role of Paint-by-Numbers in the Age of Artificial Intelligence?
description: Artificial intelligence can now generate artwork in seconds. With a few prompts, algorithms can create paintings, illustrations, and designs that once took humans hours—or even years—to master. Speed, efficiency, and scale have redefined what “creative output” looks like. Yet something curious is happening alongside this explosion of AI-generated art: people are returning to slow, manual, […]

title: Can tech bring joy into classrooms?: Kashyap Kompella on one possible future for AI
description: It is a tantalising possibility: artificial intelligence not as a techno shortcut but as the thing that gives wings to young minds.
content:
As things stand, most children spend their most formative years in a system that blunts their distinctive edges on a daily basis and tries to force them all into the same mould. It’s a 12-year sentence of hard labour.
